title: SEND - Digital Notification Service | SEND in numbers
description: Learn about the data related to send notifications, institutions that are using SEND and the type of data services

sent_notifications.title: Sent notifications
sent_notifications.description: The following data refer to the notifications sent by the institutions of the public administration

digital.name: digital
digital.title: Total digital notifications
digital.description: Notifications sent to recipients via digital channels

analog.name: analog
analog.title: Total analog notifications
analog.description: Notifications sent to recipients via registered mail

authorities_and_types.title: Institutions and types of notifications sent
authorities_and_types.description: The following data shows how many institutions are using SEND, and for what type of service

total.title: Total active institutions
total.description: Institutions that have sent at least one notification

main_cat.title: Main categories of active institutions
main_cat.description: Category of institutions, ordered by number of active institutions

total.title: Type of sent notifications
total.description: The type represents the scope of application of the notification (e.g. ticket, taxes, registry office, etc.)

main_scopes.title: Main areas
main_scopes.description: Services ordered by number of deposited notifications, starting from the adoption of SEND
main_scopes.notes: * other than those whose notification is excluded via SEND pursuant to art.26, para. 17 of D.L. 76/2020
